Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Addison
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Addison, Halsted, Waveland and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Addison, Halsted, Waveland, Broadway and over regular route, due to Street blockage near Broadway/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
